alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Sebastian; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 1:10AM CST until February 27 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Benton County in northwestern Arkansas... Madison County in northwestern Arkansas... Franklin County in west central Arkansas... Western Carroll County in northwestern Arkansas... Central Crawford County in northwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Sebastian County in west central Arkansas... Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 200 AM CST. * At 110 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Pea Ridge to 4 miles northwest of Prairie Grove to near Barling, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Berryville... Ozark... Charleston... Huntsville... Eureka Springs... Mountainburg... Lowell... Farmington... Alma... Pea Ridge... Prairie Grove... Elkins... Tontitown... West Fork... Lavaca... Cave Springs... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 11 and 42. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 89. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Carroll; Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Sebastian; Washington
